tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ClimateChangeData (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location TEXT,
  temperature FLOAT,
  humidity FLOAT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE climate_data (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  temperature FLOAT,
  humidity FLOAT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE ClimateData (
	data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	location TEXT,
	temperature FLOAT,
	humidity FLOAT,
	timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE Ecosystems (
	ecology_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	ecology_name TEXT,
	region TEXT,
	climate_status TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE ResearchTeams (
	team_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	team_name TEXT,
	lead_researcher TEXT,
	members TEXT[],
	start_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE DataAnalysis (
	analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	data_id INT REFERENCES ClimateData(data_id),
	team_id INT REFERENCES ResearchTeams(team_id),
	impacts TEXT[],
	conclusions TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Funding (
	grant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	grant_name TEXT,
	amount FLOAT,
	team_id INT REFERENCES ResearchTeams(team_id),
	start_date DATE,
	end_date DATE
)
